subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Backstrom had a goal and an assist and José Théodore made 31 saves to help the Capitals to a 4-2 victory over the Sabres in Buffalo.
snippet: Nicklas Backstrom had a goal and an assist and José Théodore made 31 saves to help the Capitals to a 4-2 victory over the Sabres in Buffalo.
